document_data.caption: The knights battle a [[dracolich]]
document_data.name: Knights of the Eternal Order
document_data.orgname: the Knights of the Eternal Order
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Knights of the Eternal Order''' was a knightly order in service of the god of the dead, [[Kelemvor]], during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. [[Church of Kelemvor|Kelemvor's church]] gathered the knights together to hunt down and destroy powerful undead from a fortress outside of [[Iriaebor]].

Among their members were paladins, and some [[doomguide]]s.
